GClasses::GKernelMachine

GClasses::GKernelMachine Class Reference

An experimental kernel machine. Currently this algorithm is not competitive with state-of-the-art kernel machines. More...

#include <GKernelTrick.h>

Detailed Description

An experimental kernel machine. Currently this algorithm is not competitive with state-of-the-art kernel machines.
